verses.text: Bel boweth down, Nebo stoopeth, their idols were upon the beasts, and upon the cattle: your loads \add were\add* heavy; \add they were\add* a burden to the weary \add beast\add* .
They stoop, they bow down together; they could not deliver the burden, but themselves have gone into captivity.
Hearken to me, O house of Jacob, and all the remnant of the house of Israel, which are borne \add by me\add* from the birth, which are carried from the womb:

And \add even\add* to \add your\add* old age I \add am\add* he; and \add even\add* to hoary hairs will I carry \add you\add* : I have made, and I will bear; even I will carry, and will deliver \add you\add* .
To whom will ye liken me, and make \add me\add* equal, and compare me, that we may be like?
They lavish gold out of the bag, and weigh silver in the balance, \add and\add* hire a goldsmith; and he maketh it a god: they fall down, yes, they worship.

They bear him upon the shoulder, they carry him, and set him in his place, and he standeth; from his place shall he not remove: yes, \add one\add* shall cry to him, yet he cannot answer, nor save him out of his trouble.
Remember this, and show yourselves men: bring \add it\add* again to mind, O ye transgressors.
Remember the former things of old: for I \add am\add* God, and \add there is\add* none else; I \add am\add* God, and \add there is\add* none like me,
Declaring the end from the beginning, and from ancient times \add the things\add* that are not \add yet\add* done, saying, My counsel shall stand, and I will do all my pleasure:

Calling a ravenous bird from the east, the man that executeth my counsel from a far country: yes, I have spoken \add it\add* , I will also bring it to pass; I have purposed \add it\add* , I will also perform it.
Hearken to me, ye stout-hearted, that \add are\add* far from righteousness:
I bring near my righteousness; it shall not be far off, and my salvation shall not delay: and I will place salvation in Zion for Israel my glory.
